item.name: Ajouter un membre à une équipe

graphql.query:
mutation setClock($employeeId : ID!,
$date:String!,
$start : String,
$end : String
$status:ClockStatus) {
    setClock (employee_id:$employeeId,
date:$date,
start:$start,
end:$end,
status:$status) {
    id
    date       
    start      
    end        
    employee_id
    status   
}
}

mutation setClock($employeeId : ID!,
$date:String!,
$start : String,
$end : String
$status:ClockStatus) {
    setClock (employee_id:$employeeId,
date:$date,
start:$start,
end:$end,
status:$status) {
    id
    date       
    start      
    end        
    employee_id
    status   
}
}
